item.title: ::master
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("If You Die Like This...Just Quit, Agreed?"); }
you can change the “if you die like this…just quit, agreed?” to whatever message you want it to send to them when they enter the code. this is set for mods+ to be able to use, change “playerRights >= 1)” if you want that to change, 2 for admin, 3 for owner
as far as placement goes, just hit ctrl+f in your client, and search a command that already exists in your server, put the little blinking text bar before all the words in that line, hit enter, ctrl+v, and your good. post any errors\problems

Read full topic
